timeline.bodyText: Do we actually need this method at all?  All the tests that call it also have access to the leafSearchLookup object so they could just use that?
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: you mean that we should make leafSearchLookup protected? I don't think the tests have access to it today but maybe they should.
replies.author: javanna

replies.bodyText: Right, leafSearchLookup is currently private. I was just thinking of this as a tiny incremental improvement to avoid another person being confused by the javadoc.
replies.author: jtibshirani
romseygeek

replies.bodyText: Thanks @romseygeek for the suggestion, I updated the PR to remove AbstractFieldScript#getSource entirely.
replies.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Makes sense to me too, thanks
replies.author: javanna
